sentence: The government quickly pushed through the new laws late last week to counter industry concerns that Stephen Fitzpatrick, the founder of Ovo Energy, could use his almost two-thirds stake in the company to liquidate its long-term gas contracts and exit the supply market with a hefty profit.
author: Jillian Ambrose
title: New ‘super tax’ to deter energy firm owners from gas profiteering

sentence: +4 View gallery Ovo Energy boss Stephen Fitzpatrick, 45, had woodburning stove fitted in his mansion +4 View gallery The charming Cotswold Manor owned by the founder of OVO Energy Stephen Fitzpatrick +4 View gallery The cooker had to be given permission by his local council in the Cotswolds, Gloucestershire Trendy wood burners TRIPLE the level of harmful pollution particles inside homes Wood burners are a danger to children and elderly people and should be sold with a health warning, a study finds.
author: Dan Sales For Mailonline
title: Millionaire Ovo energy boss who told customers to 'cuddle your cat, eat porridge and do star jumps' if they're cold has a trendy £1,200 woodburning stove in his £3.2m Cotswolds

sentence: "Our investigation also determined that Quay-Sean began to stalk Amelia, and he would show up unannounced at [her work] seeking to rekindle their relationship," Fitzpatrick said.
title: Suspected Killer Went to Gym After Shooting Ex-Girlfriend in NY Parking Garage: DA

sentence: “He immediately came up behind her, shot at her ten times, strangled her nine times,” Fitzpatrick said in an WABC report.
author: Alberto Luperon
title: Ex-Boyfriend Shot and Strangled Woman in Ambush Murder, Then Went to Gym: Authorities
